pinyin: Bei3 jing1 Gong1 ren2 Ti3 yu4 chang3

sentences.english: Carnitine is a nutrient that helps the body turn fat into energy.
sentences.chinese: 肉鹼是一種營養，幫助人體脂肪轉化爲能量。

sentences.english: Engage your core muscles, then curl your upper body towards a sitting position.
sentences.chinese: 調動人體核心部位的肌肉力量向上擡體，成坐姿。

sentences.english: The medical student studies the skeleton of the human body.
sentences.chinese: 醫學專業的學生研究人體的屍骸。

sentences.english: But formaldehyde is virulent, that must do a great harm to the persons.
sentences.chinese: 因爲甲醛有劇毒，會對人體造成很大的傷害。

sentences.english: It’s illegal to change the clothes on a storefront mannequin unless you draw the shades first.
sentences.chinese: 給前店的人體模特兒換衣服時必須有遮擋，否則違法。

sentences.english: Used thermosetting printing ink (environmental protection printing ink) all are harmless to the environment and the human body.
sentences.chinese: 我們的印嘜燙畫全部採用環保油墨，對人體無害。

sentences.english: No laboratory analysis service for saxitoxin test in humans is currently available in Macao.
sentences.chinese: 本澳目前並無對人體中石房蛤毒素含量的實驗室檢測。

sentences.english: Therefore silk is known as "second-skin body" of reputation.
sentences.chinese: 因而蠶絲素有“人體第二肌膚”之美譽。
無遮蓋的人體畫像，有時具有諷喻意義。

sentences.english: The ceramic tablewares have a bearing on human body.
sentences.chinese: 陶瓷食具是盛放食物的容器，與人體健康休慼相關。

sentences.english: Inhalable particulate matters(IP)bring adverse influence on ambient air and human health.
sentences.chinese: 可吸入顆粒物嚴重影響空氣質量和人體健康。

sentences.english: The theory of yin and yang serves to explain the organic structure physiologicing changes of the human body.
sentences.chinese: 五行學說能夠評釋人體的生理功效和病理形態。

sentences.english: The paper discusses design requirements from the perspective of manikin engineering.
sentences.chinese: 本文從人體工程學角度論述了椅子的設計要求。

sentences.english: Shanghai Painting Art Academy uses nude model in its classes.
sentences.chinese: 上海圖畫美術院在教學中使用人體模特兒。

sentences.english: How much procyanidins would you have to consume to feel the benefits?
sentences.chinese: 人體必須攝取多少原花青素才能起作用？

sentences.english: Results Gallbladder of human body has triangular recess .
sentences.chinese: 結果人體存在膽囊三角隱窩。

definition: within the body/in vivo (vs in vitro)/internal to
to absorb (nutrients etc)/to assimilate/intake/to take a photograph of (a scene)
to adjust/to regulate/to harmonize/to reconcile (accountancy etc)
